mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMPANY (ID, COMPANY_BUSINESS_NUMBER, COMPANY_CERTIFICATE_PATH, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_CEO, COMPANY_MAIN_ADDRESS, COMPANY_SUB_ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_COMPANY.NEXTVAL, #{companyBusinessNumber}, #{companyCertificatePath}, #{companyName}, #{companyCEO}, #{companyMainAddress}, #{companySubAddress})
mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, C.COMPANY_BUSINESS_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.CREATED_DATE, M.MEMBER_RECENT_LOGIN, M.MEMBER_STATUS FROM TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON CM.ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON C.ID = CM.COMPANY_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_CLASS='기업'

SELECT M.ID, C.ID AS COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, C.COMPANY_BUSINESS_NUMBER, C.COMPANY_ESTABLISHMENT, C.COMPANY_EMPLOYEE, C.COMPANY_MAIN_ADDRESS, C.COMPANY_SUB_ADDRESS , C.COMPANY_LOGO_PATH, C.COMPANY_URL, C.COMPANY_CERTIFICATE_PATH, C.COMPANY_INTRODUCE, C.COMPANY_WELFARE, C.COMPANY_CULTURE, C.COMPANY_CEO ,CM.COMPANY_MEMBER_DEPARTMENT, CM.COMPANY_MEMBER_POSITION, M.MEMBER_RECENT_LOGIN, M.CREATED_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_STATUS
SELECT M.ID, C.ID AS COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, C.COMPANY_BUSINESS_NUMBER, C.COMPANY_ESTABLISHMENT, C.COMPANY_EMPLOYEE, C.COMPANY_MAIN_ADDRESS, C.COMPANY_LOGO_PATH, C.COMPANY_URL, C.COMPANY_CERTIFICATE_PATH, C.COMPANY_INTRODUCE, C.COMPANY_WELFARE, C.COMPANY_CULTURE, C.COMPANY_CEO ,CM.COMPANY_MEMBER_DEPARTMENT, CM.COMPANY_MEMBER_POSITION, M.MEMBER_RECENT_LOGIN, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_STATUS
FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM ON CM.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON M.ID = CM.ID WHERE M.ID = #{id} AND M.MEMBER_CLASS='기업'
SELECT * FROM TBL_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = #{memberStatus} WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT P.ID, COMPANY_NAME, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_END_DATE, PROGRAM_STATUS, PROGRAM_DETAIL, PROGRAM_PRICE, PROGRAM_BENEFIT, PROGRAM_THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_PROGRAM P ON C.ID = P.COMPANY_ID AND C.ID = ${id} AND PROGRAM_STATUS = '작성중'
